actions.text: Ordered to lie over under the rule.

official_title: Resolution to express the concern of the United States Senate about the April 20,1978, Soviet attack on Korean Airlines Flight 902.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the Senate that the President instruct the Permanent United States Representative to the United Nations to press for consideration of a resolution condemning the actions of the Soviet Union with regard to Korean Airlines flight 902.

titles.title: Resolution to express the concern of the United States Senate about the April 20,1978, Soviet attack on Korean Airlines Flight 902.
